meta.title: Get All Wishlists - Wishlists - Wishlists - Management APIs - API Reference
meta.description:
Returns a list of wishlists. Optional filter parameters can be passed in.

Authorization

OAuth Scopes



Headers



Example



For more information on ...

blocks.data: Returns a list of wishlists. Optional filter parameters can be passed in.

### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Customers | modify | `store_v2_customers` |
|  Customers | read-only | `store_v2_customers_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication).
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

customer_id.description: All wishlists relating to the customer.

page.description: The page number of results per page. 1 is the default and starts from record 0.

limit.description: The numbers of items to return per page. Default is 50 and maximum is 250.

id.description: Wishlist ID, provided after creating a wishlist with a POST.

customer_id.description: The ID the customer to which the wishlist belongs.

is_public.description: Whether the wishlist is available to the public.

token.description: The token of the wishlist. This is created internally within BigCommerce. The wishlist ID is to be used for external apps. Read-Only.

variant_id.description: The variant ID of the product.

pagination.title: pagination
pagination.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

total.description: Total number of items in the result set.

count.description: Total number of items in the collection response.

per_page.description: The amount of items returned in the collection per page, controlled by the limit parameter.

current_page.description: The page you are currently on within the collection.

total_pages.description: The total number of pages in the collection.

blocks.data: Authentication information is missing or invalid.
